      • startServer

        protected void startServer(java.lang.String clsName)
        choose a port to start the selenium server.
        参数:
        clsName - the runtime class name
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • stopServer

        protected void stopServer()
        stop the selenium server
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • startWebDriver

        protected void startWebDriver(java.lang.String browser)
        start webdirver
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • startWebDriver

        protected void startWebDriver()
        start webdirver using browser iexplore
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • closeWebDriver

        protected void closeWebDriver()
        closeWebDriver, close current session opened by webdriver.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • stopWebDriver

        protected void stopWebDriver()
        quitWebDriver, close webdriver instance and clear all sessions.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • distinctName

        protected java.lang.String distinctName(java.lang.String dir,
                            java.lang.String fileName,
                            java.lang.String fileType)
        get a new distinct filename only if the file exists already
        参数:
        dir - file location
        fileName - file name to judge
        fileType - file type such as ".html"
        返回:
        if file exists then add mark by time
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • testCunstruction

        protected void testCunstruction(java.lang.String className)
        prepare to start tests, for testng beforetest.
        参数:
        className - the class name for log record file name
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • testTermination

        protected void testTermination()
        stop all started tests, for testng aftertest.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • remoteMessageRecord

        private java.util.logging.Logger remoteMessageRecord(java.lang.String clsName)
        user defined log to append standard server log.
        参数:
        clsName - extra log filename to append
        返回:
        Logger
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • pause

        protected void pause(long millis)
        wait milli seconds.
        参数:
        millis - time to wait, in millisecond

      • pass

        protected void pass(java.lang.String message)
        record to logs with fail info messages.
        参数:
        message - the message to be recroded to logs

      • fail

        protected void fail(java.lang.String message)
        record to logs with fail info messages.
        参数:
        message - the message to be recroded to logs

      • failAndExit

        protected void failAndExit(java.lang.String message)
        record to logs with fail info messages and exit run.
        参数:
        message - the message to be recroded to logs

      • warn

        protected void warn(java.lang.String message)
        record to logs with fail info messages.
        参数:
        message - the message to be recroded to logs

      • report

        private void report(java.lang.String status,
          java.lang.String message)
        record to logs with fail info messages.
        参数:
        status - the result status to be logged
        message - the message to be recroded to logs
